FontString.text: Send to one of your characters of the same realm

Scripts.OnUpdate: if TRPModifyPetInfoNomSaisie:GetText() and TRPModifyPetInfoNomSaisie:GetText() ~= "" then TRPModifyPetInfoNomGet:SetText(TRPModifyPetInfoNomSaisie:GetText()) else TRPModifyPetInfoNomGet:SetText(tostring(TRPModifyPetInfo.creatureName)); end TRPModifyPetInfoDescriGet:SetText("Max characters :\n " ..(string.len(TRPModifyPetInfoNomSaisie:GetText())+string.len(TRPModifyPetInfoDescriSaisie:GetText())) .." / "..(240-string.len(TRPModifyPetInfo.creatureName)));
